Reviews.Title: Wonderful Phone...Needs an Update
Reviews.Author: S. Yates "Yates"
Reviews.Content: This phone is great with the exception it doesn't give you a light indicator when a text or voicemail is received, so if one leaves it for a few you would need to remember to check the screen for recent missed activity. Other than that, it's a great upgrade from the i465!

Reviews.Title: Good Starter/basic phone.
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: This phone is okay as a starter phone.  Do not recommend for internet or picture taking but the phone as a phone is good for the price.  People with arthritis or over 40 vision may find this phone difficult to operate.

Reviews.Title: No longer in service by Boost Mobile
Reviews.Author: Lucas
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone a few months back, and Boost Mobile no longer services this phone model. Do not buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellant
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: Excellant phone, i had a i465 but this upgrade is alot better.  The shipment was great i didn't expect it to arrive until saturday.

Reviews.Title: This phone sucks!
Reviews.Author: Melish
Reviews.Content: I absolutely hate this phone and hate that I actually spent more than $80.00 on it. Combined with the Boost mobile service it is the worst! The phone seems so "old school" compared to my last phone that I had for the last 3 years (LG Dare). It won't allow me to receive text messages in my apartment even though I have full bars on my service.

Reviews.Title: Not work as I spected...
Reviews.Author: lachula
Reviews.Content: El volumen no es muy bueno, al menos en el aparato que recibi, no me gusto y no lo recomendaria... Aunque muy buen empaque y envio...
